articles.content: We have quickly entered the offseason and the Atlanta Braves shortstop situation still remains a question mark and will more than likely remain that way for the near future. Dansby Swanson was among … [+2852 chars]

articles.title: Instant Reactions: Maryland 71, Western Carolina 51 - 247Sports
articles.description: Reactions and rundown from Maryland's win.
articles.content: In its second act of the Kevin Willard era, Maryland basketball didn't exactly torch the nets Thursday night against Western Carolina. But it didn't matter. The Terps got a dominant performance from … [+6562 chars]
